Text:
Downloaded without problem. Visuals seem to be ok and the audio is in sync.

BUT....

This is NOT 3D. Yes, it is SBS and you need 3D glasses to watch it, and it is nice sharp 1080p, so I guess it is an attempt at a 2D to 3D conversion. (the original was never made in 3D, was it??). I viewed it on an LG 55inch Cinema 3D TV but I could not see any depth or 3D at all.

Thanks for the effort uploader but I think you wasted your time cos it just didnt work. Better luck next time.
